definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
lit. as the autumn gale sweeps away the fallen leaves (idiom); to drive out the old and make a clean sweep
see 樹高千丈，葉落歸根|树高千丈，叶落归根[shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , ye4 luo4 gui1 gen1]
pinyin: shu4 gao1 qian1 zhang4 , luo4 ye4 gui1 gen1

sentences.english: Autumn disrobes the trees of leaves.
Some larches are bent down by the weight of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些落葉松被厚重的積雪壓倒了。

sentences.english: This is the simile of the leaves.
A mossy stone wall sets off the brilliant red of fallen maple leaves.
sentences.chinese: 青苔爬遍石牆，襯得槭樹落葉更灩紅。

sentences.english: The wind drifted the leaves across the road.
Fascinated, my eyes reverting from the south, dropt, to follow those.
sentences.chinese: 令人着迷，目轉南方答之不及，低，那些落葉。

sentences.english: The strong gusts whipped up eddies of fallen leaves.
sentences.chinese: 強勁的陣風激起了落葉漩渦。

sentences.english: Faint winds, and a song fading and leaves falling.
sentences.chinese: 無力的風，歌聲漸弱，落葉瀟瀟。

sentences.english: Deciduous leaf bush or small tree.
Although their juices had run dry, the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 只管已乾涸，落葉仍披髮出好聞的噴香味。

sentences.english: The leaves fall early this autumn, in wind.
sentences.chinese: 苔深不能掃，落葉秋風早。

sentences.english: Arabinogalactan is a water soluble gum extracted from the sawdust of Larix gmelinii( Rupr.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯半乳聚糖是從落葉松木屑中提取的水溶性樹膠。

sentences.english: The factors influencing the graft rate of larch keampferi tree were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究各因素對南方日本落葉松嫁接苗成活率的影響。

sentences.english: Although their juices had run dry， the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 儘管已乾枯，落葉仍散發出好聞的香味。

sentences.english: At this stage, the butterfly is capable of defoliating your butterfly garden.
sentences.chinese: 在這一階段，蝴蝶能夠落葉您的蝴蝶園。

sentences.english: Walking in the daily on the way to pass, See the fallen leaves all over the ground.
sentences.chinese: 走在那條每天上下班要經過的路，只見落葉滿地都是。

definition: to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
